descriptions.documentManagement: Use our document record service to create a new record or search for existing ones. To edit a record, simply search for and open the document record.
descriptions.documentIndexing: Fill in required information to create a new document record.

documentSearch.title: Document Search
documentSearch.description: Search for original registration documents and filings. Enter Entity ID or Document category to selected a date range to search by.

docId.label: Document Record ID
docId.help: Enter the 8 digit document record ID number

dateRange.label: Filing Date
dateRange.help: Date range of registered documents you would like to search

documentIndexing.label: Document Record Details
documentIndexing.reviewSubtitle: Review your document record details before saving.

id.label: Entity ID
id.description: Enter the entity ID of this document filing. The entity ID must be entered if there is one.

docId.label: Document ID
docId.description: Enter the 8-digit Document ID, also referred to as the Barcode Number. If you don't have a Document ID, one will be generated upon saving the document record.

checkbox.label: I do not have an Entity ID

docIdCheckbox.label: I do not have a Document ID

dateSelect.label: Filing Date
dateSelect.description: Enter date of filling or the registration date which was entered into BC Registries.

documentUpload.title: Upload Documents
documentUpload.help: File must be a PDF. Maximum 50 MB.
documentUpload.fileSizeError: Documents exceeds maximum 50 MB file size
documentUpload.fileTypeError: Documents must be of PDF file type

documentReview.title: Document Information Saved
documentReview.description: Your document information has been successfully uploaded and saved. To view, complete a search on the document management page using the following information

documentRecord.title: Document Record
documentRecord.description: View and download your document record
documentRecord.subtitle: Document Record Information

cancelDialog.title: Cancel Document Record Changes
cancelDialog.description: This will undo any changes you have made and return you to the original state.
